actions.committee: House Committee on Education and the Workforce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.

official_title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives in support of the Common Core State Standards Initiative.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the National Governors Association Center for Best Practices and the Council of Chief State School Officers should be commended for their efforts to increase the rigor, utility, and comparability of state academic standards.

titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives in support of the Common Core State Standards Initiative.
